name: RUN BOI RUN!
description:
This game basicly is classic endless runner game.

You play as ShibaBOI run through the game until  you hit an obstacle or fall into the hole  with the point being to achieve the highest possible score.  

Eat chocolate muffin to speed up BOI!

  • Cute visual graphic that inspired by The Legend of Zelda: Link's Awakening (Remake)
  • Increase difficulty over time, the game will be harder and faster  after you play for a while.
  • Controls are simple, focusing on actions such as jumping over or rolling under obstacles.
  • This game have Day-Night cycle system.
  • Challenge player to break high score.

This game still in development i'll update this game in the future.

BOI - Playable character

You can follow me on my youtube channel (Thai language)

My Youtube Channel

Thank you for playing my game .

Have fun!
